derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'grotesque figure'): from Old French marmouset 'grotesque image', of unknown ultimate origin

entry.def: A marmoset is a type of small monkey.

means.word_mean: 1. small soft-furred South American and Central American monkey with claws instead of nails
